languages.text: "Не буду отрицать, не все наши эксперименты с популяцией обходятся без жертв... видите ли, одно из благородных семейств Януса взяло на себя непростую задачу — направленное улучшение свойств наших работников. Пока что это экспериментальное внесение добавок в питание и проведение ментальной обработки в контрольных поселках. Иногда процедуры нарушаются, и часть населения страдает от побочных эффектов... право, специалисты семьи Гравац лучше бы просветили вас на этот счет, но увы, в данный момент они заняты на местах".

traits.locale_text: "Не буду отрицать, не все наши эксперименты с популяцией обходятся без жертв... видите ли, одно из благородных семейств Януса взяло на себя непростую задачу — направленное улучшение свойств наших работников. Пока что это экспериментальное внесение добавок в питание и проведение ментальной обработки в контрольных поселках. Иногда процедуры нарушаются, и часть населения страдает от побочных эффектов... право, специалисты семьи Гравац лучше бы просвятили вас на этот счет, но увы, в данный момент они заняты на местах".

languages.text: "I don't deny it — some of our experiments exact a higher toll on the population than others... You see, recently one of the noble families of Janus has taken on the difficult task of enhancing the attributes of our workers. So far, it has involved introducing experimental supplements to their food and mental conditioning in monitored settlements. Sometimes procedures are disrupted and part of the population suffers from side effects... The specialists of the Gravaz family would be better placed to inform you on this topic, but alas, they are currently engaged in the field."
languages.original_text: "Не буду отрицать, не все наши эксперименты с популяцией обходятся без жертв... видите ли, одно из благородных семейств Януса взяло на себя непростую задачу — направленное улучшение свойств наших работников. Пока что это экспериментальное внесение добавок в питание и проведение ментальной обработки в контрольных поселках. Иногда процедуры нарушаются, и часть населения страдает от побочных эффектов... право, специалисты семьи Гравац лучше бы просветили вас на этот счет, но увы, в данный момент они заняты на местах".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, that. I don't deny it — some of our experiments exact a higher toll on the population than others... You see, for the last few years, I and my advisors have been trying to enhance the attributes of our workers. So far, it has involved introducing experimental supplements to their food and mental conditioning in monitored settlements. Sometimes procedures are disrupted and part of the population suffers from side effects... Our specialists would be better placed to inform you on this topic, but alas, they are currently engaged in the field."

"I don't deny it — some of our experiments exact a higher toll on the population than others... You see, recently one of the noble families of Janus has taken on the difficult task of enhancing the attributes of our workers. So far, it has involved introducing experimental supplements to their food and mental conditioning in monitored settlements. Sometimes procedures are disrupted and part of the population suffers from side effects... The specialists of the Gravaz family would be better placed to inform you on this topic, but alas, they are currently engaged in the field."

So far, it has involved introducing experimental supplements to their food and mental conditioning in monitored settlements. Sometimes procedures are disrupted and part of the population suffers from side effects... The specialists of the Gravaz family would be better placed to inform you on this topic, but alas, they are currently engaged in the field."

languages.text: “我不否认这一点。我们的某些实验确实会对人口造成比较大的伤害……如您所知，最近加努斯的某个贵族家族承担了一项艰巨任务，用来提高工人们的身体素质。到目前为止，这项任务包括：在受监控的定居点之中，为当地工人提供实验性的补充剂与精神引导服务。有的时候，流程会被打乱，一部分人口会受到副作用的影响……格拉瓦兹家族的专家应该更有资格向您介绍这方面的情况，但遗憾的是，他们目前正忙于实地工作。”
languages.original_text: "I don't deny it — some of our experiments exact a higher toll on the population than others... You see, recently one of the noble families of Janus has taken on the difficult task of enhancing the attributes of our workers. So far, it has involved introducing experimental supplements to their food and mental conditioning in monitored settlements. Sometimes procedures are disrupted and part of the population suffers from side effects... The specialists of the Gravaz family would be better placed to inform you on this topic, but alas, they are currently engaged in the field."

traits.locale_text: “我不否认这一点。我们的某些实验确实会对人口造成比较大的伤害……如您所知，最近加努斯的某个贵族家族承担了一项艰巨任务，用来提高工人们的身体素质。到目前为止，这项任务包括：在受监控的定居点之中，为当地工人提供实验性的补充剂与精神引导服务。有的时候，流程会被打乱，一部分人口会受到副作用的影响……格拉瓦兹家族的专家应该更有资格向您介绍这方面的情况，但遗憾的是，他们目前正忙于实地工作。”

languages.text: «No voy a negarlo. Algunos de nuestros experimentos pasan una factura más elevada a la población que otros... Verá, no hace mucho que una de las familias nobles de Janus emprendió la difícil tarea de mejorar las capacidades de nuestros trabajadores. De momento, para ello ha añadido suplementos experimentales a la comida y acondicionamiento mental en asentamientos controlados. Ocasionalmente, algo interfiere en el proceso y parte de la población sufre efectos secundarios... Los especialistas de la familia Gravaz estarían mejor cualificados para entrar en detalles, pero están todos ocupados sobre el terreno ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: "I don't deny it — some of our experiments exact a higher toll on the population than others... You see, recently one of the noble families of Janus has taken on the difficult task of enhancing the attributes of our workers. So far, it has involved introducing experimental supplements to their food and mental conditioning in monitored settlements. Sometimes procedures are disrupted and part of the population suffers from side effects... The specialists of the Gravaz family would be better placed to inform you on this topic, but alas, they are currently engaged in the field."

traits.locale_text: «No voy a negarlo. Algunos de nuestros experimentos pasan una factura más elevada a la población que otros... Verá, no hace mucho que una de las familias nobles de Janus emprendió la difícil tarea de mejorar las capacidades de nuestros trabajadores. De momento, para ello ha añadido suplementos experimentales a la comida y acondicionamiento mental en asentamientos controlados. Ocasionalmente, algo interfiere en el proceso y parte de la población sufre efectos secundarios... Los especialistas de la familia Gravaz estarían mejor cualificados para entrar en detalles, pero están todos ocupados sobre el terreno ahora mismo».

languages.text: 「否定はしません。私たちが行う実験の中には、他の実験よりも多くの犠牲者を必要とするものがあります…ご存知のように、あるヤヌスの貴族家は、労働者の質を高めるという困難な課題を引き受けています。これまでは、食事に添加するサプリメントや精神調整を監視下の開拓地で行ってきました。時に手順が守られずに住民の一部が副作用に苦しむことも…私よりグラヴァズ家の専門家の方がこの件をお話しするのに適任ではあるのですが、あいにく、今は現場に出ていまして」
languages.original_text: "I don't deny it — some of our experiments exact a higher toll on the population than others... You see, recently one of the noble families of Janus has taken on the difficult task of enhancing the attributes of our workers. So far, it has involved introducing experimental supplements to their food and mental conditioning in monitored settlements. Sometimes procedures are disrupted and part of the population suffers from side effects... The specialists of the Gravaz family would be better placed to inform you on this topic, but alas, they are currently engaged in the field."

traits.locale_text: 「否定はしません。私たちが行う実験の中には、他の実験よりも多くの犠牲者を必要とするものがあります…ご存知のように、あるヤヌスの貴族家は、労働者の質を高めるという困難な課題を引き受けています。これまでは、食事に添加するサプリメントや精神調整を監視下の開拓地で行ってきました。時に手順が守られずに住民の一部が副作用に苦しむことも…私よりグラヴァズ家の専門家の方がこの件をお話しするのに適任ではあるのですが、あいにく、今は現場に出ていまして」

languages.text: "Das leugne ich nicht – einige unserer Experimente fordern von der Bevölkerung einen höheren Tribut als andere ... Wisst Ihr, eine der Adelsfamilien von Janus hat kürzlich die schwierige Aufgabe übernommen, die Eigenschaften unserer Arbeiter zu verbessern. Bisher wurden dazu ihrem Essen experimentelle Ergänzungsmittel beigemischt und in überwachten Ansiedlungen psychische Konditionierungen durchgeführt. Manchmal werden solche Prozesse abgebrochen, und ein Teil der Bevölkerung leidet dann unter Nebenwirkungen ... Die Spezialisten der Familie Gravaz hätten Euch darüber informieren sollen, aber leider sind sie derzeit auf dem Feld beschäftigt."
languages.original_text: "I don't deny it — some of our experiments exact a higher toll on the population than others... You see, recently one of the noble families of Janus has taken on the difficult task of enhancing the attributes of our workers. So far, it has involved introducing experimental supplements to their food and mental conditioning in monitored settlements. Sometimes procedures are disrupted and part of the population suffers from side effects... The specialists of the Gravaz family would be better placed to inform you on this topic, but alas, they are currently engaged in the field."

traits.locale_text: "Das leugne ich nicht – einige unserer Experimente fordern von der Bevölkerung einen höheren Tribut als andere ... Wisst Ihr, eine der Adelsfamilien von Janus hat kürzlich die schwierige Aufgabe übernommen, die Eigenschaften unserer Arbeiter zu verbessern. Bisher wurden dazu ihrem Essen experimentelle Ergänzungsmittel beigemischt und in überwachten Ansiedlungen psychische Konditionierungen durchgeführt. Manchmal werden solche Prozesse abgebrochen, und ein Teil der Bevölkerung leidet dann unter Nebenwirkungen ... Die Spezialisten der Familie Gravaz hätten Euch darüber informieren sollen, aber leider sind sie derzeit auf dem Feld beschäftigt."

languages.text: « Il est vrai que certaines de nos expériences ont des effets plus lourds que la normale sur la population... Permettez-moi de vous expliquer. Il y a quelque temps, l'une des familles nobles de Janus s'est attelée à la tâche difficile d'améliorer les aptitudes de nos ouvriers. Jusqu'ici, leur approche consiste à administrer des compléments nutritifs expérimentaux et utiliser des techniques de conditionnement mental dans des villages sous surveillance. Cependant, il arrive que les procédures soient perturbées et que certains sujets souffrent d'effets secondaires... Les spécialistes de la famille Gravaz seraient mieux placés pour vous informer sur le sujet, mais malheureusement, ils sont actuellement occupés sur le terrain. »
languages.original_text: "I don't deny it — some of our experiments exact a higher toll on the population than others... You see, recently one of the noble families of Janus has taken on the difficult task of enhancing the attributes of our workers. So far, it has involved introducing experimental supplements to their food and mental conditioning in monitored settlements. Sometimes procedures are disrupted and part of the population suffers from side effects... The specialists of the Gravaz family would be better placed to inform you on this topic, but alas, they are currently engaged in the field."

traits.locale_text: « Il est vrai que certaines de nos expériences ont des effets plus lourds que la normale sur la population... Permettez-moi de vous expliquer. Il y a quelque temps, l'une des familles nobles de Janus s'est attelée à la tâche difficile d'améliorer les aptitudes de nos ouvriers. Jusqu'ici, leur approche consiste à administrer des compléments nutritifs expérimentaux et utiliser des techniques de conditionnement mental dans des villages sous surveillance. Cependant, il arrive que les procédures soient perturbées et que certains sujets souffrent d'effets secondaires... Les spécialistes de la famille Gravaz seraient mieux placés pour vous informer sur le sujet, mais malheureusement, ils sont actuellement occupés sur le terrain. »

languages.text: "İnkâr etmeyeceğim, bazı deneylerimizin halk üstündeki külfeti diğerlerine kıyasla daha fazla oluyor... Janus'un soylu ailelerinden biri, yakın zamanda işçilerimizin niteliklerini geliştirmek gibi zor bir görev üstlendi. Şimdilik yaptıkları, kontrollü yerleşim yerlerinde gıdalara deneysel takviyeler katmak ve zihinsel koşullandırma icra etmek. Bazen prosedürler aksıyor ve nüfusun bir kısmı yan etkilerden muzdarip olabiliyor. Gravaz ailesinin uzmanları sizi bu konuda çok daha net bilgilendirebilirdi lakin ne yazık ki şu anda sahada çalışıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "I don't deny it — some of our experiments exact a higher toll on the population than others... You see, recently one of the noble families of Janus has taken on the difficult task of enhancing the attributes of our workers. So far, it has involved introducing experimental supplements to their food and mental conditioning in monitored settlements. Sometimes procedures are disrupted and part of the population suffers from side effects... The specialists of the Gravaz family would be better placed to inform you on this topic, but alas, they are currently engaged in the field."

traits.locale_text: "İnkâr etmeyeceğim, bazı deneylerimiz halka diğerlerinden daha fazla zarar veriyor. Şöyle ki Janus'un soylu ailelerinden biri, yakın zamanda işçilerimizin niteliklerini geliştirmek gibi zor bir görev üstlendi. Tek yaptıkları, kontrollü yerleşim yerlerinde gıdalara deneysel takviyeler katmak ve zihinsel koşullandırma yapmakla kaldı. Bazen prosedürler aksıyor ve nüfusun bir kısmı yan etkilerden muzdarip olabiliyor. Gravaz ailesinin uzmanları sizi bu konuda çok daha net bilgilendirebilirdi lakin ne yazık ki şu anda sahada çalışıyorlar."
